events.title: Espanyol vs Barcelona - Spanish LaLiga 2025/26 - Week 18 - Mini Match
events.desc: Espanyol have not won any of their last 28 LaLiga games against Barcelona. Only two teams have gone 29 or more consecutive matches without a win against the same opponent in the competition's history: Real Sociedad against Real Madrid between 1957 and 1979  and Hércules also against Real Madrid between 1940 and 1984. FC Barcelona are unbeaten in their last 16 away LaLiga games against Espanyol, since a 3-1 defeat in January 2007 at the Lluís Companys. This run is only surpassed by Villarreal  as their longest away unbeaten streak against the same opponent in the competition's history.

Arsenal have only failed to score in one of their 16 Premier League games against Bournemouth, though it was in a 2-0 defeat in this exact fixture last season.

events.title: Lorenzo MUSETTI (ITA) vs Carlos ALCARAZ (ESP) - Final  Rolex Monte Carlo Masters - ATP 1000 - Monaco
events.desc: In the 2025 Monte Carlo Masters final, No. 2 seed Carlos Alcaraz meets Lorenzo Musetti in a high-stakes clay-court clash. Alcaraz, chasing his first Monte Carlo title, reached his seventh Masters 1000 final after defeating Davidovich Fokina. Musetti, now the third Italian to reach this final in the Open Era, earned his spot by edging past Alex de Minaur. Alcaraz leads their head-to-head 3–1, with Musetti’s lone win coming on clay in Hamburg (2022).
